name: E-Girlfriend 0.00199/Bleading Edge (Only for patreons)
description:
WARNING!

This is a bleeding-edge version of E-Girlfriend is only available for Patrons, Subscribestar supporters, and those who decide to purchase the game on itch.

This is the latest version of E-Girlfriend, still not tested,  bugs and crashes are normal, but it's the price to see the newest content just created.

If you are looking for a more stable version of E-Girlfriend you can always download it for free here:  

https://mr-deadbird.itch.io/e-girlfriend-open-alpha
